instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115-b No green.. NO PWR ON
threads.message: .. Did not C6905 Looks bad OL on  diode mode and .674 volts with charger... I took off c6905 and still have OL on the non grounded end of cap and on f6905

threads.title: 820-3115-b No green.. NO PWR ON
threads.message:
[SIZE=48px][B]You can't measure resistance when there is power in a circuit, that's how you blow a multimeter up. Read the sticky first: [URL="https://www.rossmanngroup.com/boards/forum/board-repair-troubleshooting/5371-forum-rules"]https://www.rossmanngroup.com/boards...71-forum-rules[/URL][/B][/SIZE]

[SIZE=11px]Determine if PP3V42_G3H is present on U6901.[/SIZE]

threads.title: 820-3115-b No green.. NO PWR ON
threads.message:
[FONT=arial][SIZE=36px]WHY DID YOU ASSUME THAT I HAD CHARGER PLUGGED IN???? NOW YOU LOOK LIKE A JACK ASS!
Can i please get a real response.. c6905 reads OL so does fuse.. on diode and when i have charger plugged in im getting .658 v[/SIZE][/FONT]

threads.title: 820-3115-b No green.. NO PWR ON
threads.message: just saw the little bit of text under your huge remark.. no pp3v42 is not present....

threads.title: 820-3115-b No green.. NO PWR ON
threads.message:
[QUOTE="Aldizi, post: 11347"]OL on diode mode and .674 volts with charger... [/QUOTE]

[QUOTE="Aldizi, post: 11438"][FONT=arial][SIZE=36px]on diode and when i have charger plugged in im getting .658 v[/SIZE][/FONT][/QUOTE]

Diode mode measurements are the same as measuring resistance. [B]You CANNOT have a charger plugged in when you are measuring a voltage drop!! STOP!!![/B]

threads.title: 820-3115-b No green.. NO PWR ON
threads.message:
Are u sure your MM show you V? 
You should see something like Ω or K or M

threads.title: 820-3115-b No green.. NO PWR ON
threads.message: What it says is... on diode mode i get OL on c6905 and when i check for voltage at that same point with charger plugged in i get .658v I typed really fast i thought you would understand since it was a voltage reading and not a resistance reading but i can see the misunderstanding... either way. The whole caps thing is out of line...  i know not to have charger plugged in when on diode mode thx!

threads.title: 820-3115-b No green.. NO PWR ON
threads.message: Do you have 16v coming to the input of the circuit at R7020?

threads.title: 820-3115-b No green.. NO PWR ON
threads.message: I put 5v on pp3v42 via psu and smc burned to a crisp i cannot replace smc... no setencil or time...close thread...

threads.title: 820-3115-b No green.. NO PWR ON
threads.message: Gotcha, glad we are on the same page.
